description: Each week, guests and hosts on NPR's Pop Culture Happy Hour share what's bringing them joy. This week: The film The Shadow Strays, the memoir Ephemera, and Rachel Bloom’s Death, Let Me Do My Special.
title: What's Making Us Happy: A guide to your weekend viewing and reading

description: It's been nearly two years since Elon Musk bought Twitter and turned it into X. He has turned the platform into a megaphone for himself and, increasingly, for former President Donald Trump.
title: 2 years in, Trump surrogate Elon Musk has remade X as a conservative megaphone
